Recommend the use of masks indoors, especially in gatherings.   2.    An additional (fifth) dose of the vaccine for COVID-19 is not recommended at the present time. Most ACEC members have recommended that the vaccine for COVID-19 (2 doses + booster)  be mandatory for healthcare workers. Recommend the use of masks indoors, especially in gatherings.   2.    An additional (fifth) dose of the vaccine for COVID-19 is not recommended at the present time. However, it was decided to continue the discussion on this matter later in light of infection rates. However, it is important that individuals who are eligible for vaccination with the fourth vaccine dose and who have not been vaccinated yet complete the full vaccination schedule.   3.    The basic vaccine schedule has two doses + booster. It was decided to enable children 5 years old and older to receive a booster shot.   4.    Most ACEC members have recommended that the vaccine for COVID-19 (2 doses + booster)  be mandatory for healthcare workers.   The ACEC's recommendations will be presented to the Ministry of Health Director General for a final decision.    Source: https://archive.ph/LFY38 [Ministry of Health press release]
